means: 用两组纸牌的桥牌游戏

derivation.yuyuan_name: 1940s: from Spanish (of Uruguayan origin), literally basket', based on Latin canistrum 'basket' (see canister)

means.word_mean: 1. a form of rummy using two decks and four jokers; jokers and deuces are wild; the object is to meld groups of seven of the same rank
